doc:
Charles Sullivan (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Sullivan_(actor) 0 Charles Sullivan (April 24, 1899 – June 25, 1972), also known as Charlie Sullivan, was an American character actor who was born just before the turn of the 20th century on April 24, 1899. He would begin his acting career at the age of 25, in the 1924 silent film, His People. Over his highly prolific 30-plus-year career some sources have him appearing in over 500 films, while the American Film Institute credits him with appearing in over 250 films. Charles_Sullivan ( April_24_,_1899 – June_25_,_1972 ) , also_known as Charlie_Sullivan , was an_American_character_actor who was_born just before the_turn of the_20th_century on April_24_,_1899 . He would_begin his_acting_career at the_age of 25 , in the_1924_silent_film , His_People . Over his_highly_prolific_30-plus-year_career some_sources have him appearing in over_500_films , while the_American_Film_Institute credits him with appearing in over_250_films .
